name: Cold and Alone
description:
Oh no! Someone decided they got bored of their little shitty wattpad story they've been working on since 2017 and want to "* sPiCe tHiNgs Up! **"'

INTRODUCING COLD AND ALONE (wca for short) a pixelated Visual Novel where you play as 16-year-old Caitlyn who found out her entire town has gone missing after a bad storm! Determined to find out what the FREAK is goin' on, you (unwillingly) team up with Rachel (stupid classmate girl you don't like) to travel across the country!

Only 5% of the plot has been covered, and there's no sound either... Wow, it seems like the settings menu doesn't work... as if Mr MintyMinus got too lazy to actually work on a game ...!
Bad language warning? The kids say naughty swear words all day but they're stupid and don't know saying cuss words does not make them cool.

(The screenshots out of context tell another story ...!)
